PegaSys Engineering | Blockchain Protocol Engineer, QA, Researcher, Ops & Strategy, PM | Remote; Brooklyn / Brisbane | http://pegasys.tech/

Pegasys just open sourced our Apache 2.0 licensed, Java Based Ethereum Client at devcon 4. Come join us as we build towards the Enterprise Ethereum 2.0 spec and Serenity feature set. We are looking for engineers, bizdev, QA, and more: https://consensys.net/open-roles/?discipline=41276

We have a remote first culture. Our employees work across 10 time zones. Most of our staff are in AUS and USA presently.

PegaSys is a part of ConsenSys, a venture production studio focusing mainly on Ethereum.

Apply here https://consensys.net/open-roles/?discipline=41276 or ping me at danno.ferrin+hn@consensys.net
